summary: Responsive marketing website for Ganapati Coaching Centre (Belur) plus an added fee-management web app section for personal use, accessible at /fees, with admin student management and student PIN login to view monthly fee paid/unpaid status.
architectural_notes: Implement as a static HTML + CSS page (no framework) with responsive layout using flex/grid and a sticky header.
Include a Ganesh logo asset (SVG/PNG) and integrate it into the header branding responsively (with accessible alt text).
Add a /fees route/page alongside the existing landing page (keep existing website unchanged).
Fee app requires persistent storage for students and monthly paid/unpaid statuses, plus a simple student authentication flow using phone + admin-set PIN.

existing_features.title: Implement a responsive single-page marketing website for “Ganapati Coaching Centre” using React + Tailwind, matching the structure and content of the provided HTML: sticky header with site name and a prominent “Call Now: 6290060952” tel: CTA; Hero section with boards label “WBBSE | CBSE | ICSE”, headline “Achieve Academic Excellence”, subtitle “ADMISSION OPEN”, and supporting copy; “Our Classes” section with two cards (Class V to X: All Subjects; Class XI to XII: Arts & Science) and their descriptions; “Why Choose Us?” section with four feature items and checkmarks; “Meet Your Mentor” section with “Ayan Da”; and footer contact section showing phone 6290060952 and location “Belur Bazar (Near Belur Girl's Primary School)” and copyright “© 2024 Ganapati Coaching Centre”. All user-facing text must be in English exactly as specified.

Apply a consistent visual theme inspired by the provided HTML styling: teal/cyan primary accent, dark slate text, and a light mint background for alternate sections; use a clean modern typographic hierarchy, clear spacing, card styling with subtle shadows, and consistent section widths. Do not use a blue/purple theme.
Generate a Ganesh (Ganesha) logo image asset consistent with the existing teal/cyan + dark-slate + mint visual theme (clean, modern, simple mark suitable for small header display).

Add the generated Ganesh logo to the website branding in the sticky header next to the text “Ganapati Coaching Centre”, keeping the current layout, responsiveness, and all existing user-facing text unchanged.
Add an in-app route at the URL path "/fees" that renders a fee-management app while keeping the existing marketing landing page unchanged at "/".

Implement the fee-management app UI at "/fees" with two modes: (1) Admin panel to add students with fields Name, Phone, and PIN; and (2) Student login using PIN to view a 12-month (Jan–Dec) paid/unpaid status card.
Enable admin actions to mark monthly fees as paid/unpaid for a selected student for each of the 12 months (Jan–Dec), and persist those changes.
Integrate the frontend fee app with the backend using the existing actor creation pattern (useActor hook) and React Query for loading/mutating students and fee statuses.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a responsive single-page marketing website for Ganapati Coaching Centre (Belur) with header/call CTA, hero, classes, features, mentor, and contact footer.
Add a Ganesh (Ganesha) logo to the website branding (e.g., in the header/hero) while keeping the existing theme and layout.

Add a fee-management app within the existing site at /fees: admin can add students (name, phone, PIN) and mark monthly fees as paid/unpaid; students can log in with phone+PIN to view their own month-wise paid/unpaid status (12 months Jan–Dec).

Implement a Motoko backend in backend/main.mo to store students and their 12-month fee status, and expose canister methods for: creating students, listing students for the admin UI, student PIN login, reading a student’s fee status, and updating a month’s paid/unpaid status.
